body.p: Fonts are an important part of the publication. Your font selection should take into consideration both design and the targeted ranges of characters.
To use them in the customization CSS:

You can choose to place the font files besides your CSS and use a @font-face definition to refer them.
You can use web fonts, for example Google Fonts, and import the CSS snippet into your CSS.
